endorses Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Dick Cheney of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' area and Seattle.`` The X Factor'' has annually been the most-watched series in the United Kingdom since it debuted in 2004. It is also the most-watched series in the 15 other nations it airs in. ` The X Factor' has become a worldwide phenomenon and is unlike anything we've seen in America, said Mike Darnell , Fox Broadcasting's president of alternative entertainment.`` The British version is wildly entertaining, but also has a penchant for stirring up controversy. live TV, audience voting-- but there are a few key differences. Namely:- The X Factor has no upper age limit for adults, and allows kids as young as twelve to compete. Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
